title: Update hero background image and remove stats text

requirements.text: Save the uploaded houseboat image (Gemini_Generated_Image_ylgl2uylgl2uylgl.png) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-houseboat.png and update the Hero component to use this new image as the full-screen background, replacing the existing hero background image. Maintain the existing dark overlay for readability.

quotes: Change the cover picture to the house boat picture I have uploaded

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded houseboat at-dusk image is saved at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-houseboat.png
The Hero component background references the new hero-houseboat.png file
The dark overlay remains in place so headline and CTA text remain legible
The hero section still fills the full viewport height

requirements.text: In the Hero component, remove the three summary stat items — '500+ Happy Travellers', '7 Destinations', and '5 Star Review' — along with any surrounding container or divider elements used solely to display those stats. The heading, subheading, and CTA buttons must remain unchanged.

quotes: remove the 500+ happy travellers, 7 destinations and 5 star review texts

acceptanceCriteria: The '500+ Happy Travellers' stat text is no longer visible in the hero section
The '7 Destinations' stat text is no longer visible in the hero section
The '5 Star Review' stat text is no longer visible in the hero section
The H1 heading, subheading, and CTA buttons ('View Packages' and 'WhatsApp Now') remain present and unaffected
No empty container or ghost spacing is left behind where the stats were

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not alter the hero heading, subheading, or CTA buttons
nonGoals: Changing any other section's content or layout
Modifying the header, footer, packages, destinations, or testimonials sections
Adding new stats or replacing the removed stats with alternative content

edits: Use the uploaded file as-is, saving it as the hero background (Gemini_Generated_Image_ylgl2uylgl2uylgl.png > hero-houseboat.dim_1920x1080.png)
